content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs per my latest command, I browsed the website https://www.euroace.net/ to find out what types of language courses Euroace offers. Euroace offers group and private Spanish courses, online Spanish courses, and DELE preparation courses. They also offer specific Spanish courses, internships, gap year programs, custom study abroad programs, high school programs, and soccer programs. Additionally, I received an answer from the command browse_website, which stated that Maximo Nivel offers intensive and effective Spanish immersion programs in Latin America and online. The website also provided links to reviews, destinations, groups, and payment guarantee.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Greenheart Travel offers language camps, high school abroad programs, and teach English abroad programs. \n \n Links: ['LEARN MORE (https://greenhearttravel.org/blog/travel-resources/update-on-coronavirus)', '\\n                greenheart             (https://www.greenheart.org/)', '\\n                programs in U.S.             (https://www.greenheartexchange.org/)', '\\n                programs abroad             (https://www.greenhearttravel.org)', '\\n                fair trade             (https://www.greenheartshop.org)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.educalanguageschool.com/", "question": "What types of language courses does EDUCA Language School offer?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: EDUCA Language School offers a variety of Russian language courses, including standard group classes, one-to-one classes, full immersion programs, long-term courses, business Russian courses, Russian for kids, expatriate courses, and online classes. They also provide accommodation options and Russian visa support. Additionally, they offer travel support, outdoor cultural and social activities, and internship opportunities. The school has received positive ratings and reviews from students from over 60 countries around the world. \n \n Links: ['Courses  (https://www.educalanguageschool.com/)', 'Standard group classes (https://educalanguageschool.com/group-course)', 'One-to-one classes (https://educalanguageschool.com/individual-course)', 'Full immersion (https://educalanguageschool.com/full-immersion)', 'Live & learn (https://educalanguageschool.com/live-learn)']"}]
"""
